# Keyboard Shortcuts

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/keyboard-shortcuts-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:21:17.334313

---

Use **Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN)** keyboard shortcuts to streamline workflows and reduce production time.

## File Menu Shortcuts

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| New Level | Ctrl + N |
| Open Level | Ctrl + O |
| Save Current Level | Ctrl + S |
| Save Current Level As | Ctrl + Alt + S |
| Save All | Ctrl + SHIFT + S |

## Edit Menu Shortcuts

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Undo | Ctrl + Z |
| Redo | Ctrl + Y |
| Cut | Ctrl + X |
| Copy | Ctrl + C |
| Paste | Ctrl + V |
| Duplicate | Ctrl + D or Alt + RMB |
| Delete | Delete |

## Window Shortcuts

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| **Content Browser** | Ctrl+Space |

## Help Menu Shortcut

The Help menu shortcut opens documentation based on the tab you are working in.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Documentation | F1 |

## Settings Menu Shortcuts

Use Settings menu shortcuts to turn a selected item translucent, or to group selected props and devices together.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Allow Translucent Selection | T |
| Allow Group Selection | Ctrl + G |

## Viewport Menu Shortcuts

Viewport menu shortcuts include toggle switches for time-related options, visible elements, and game controls.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Realtime | Ctrl + R |
| Show FPS | Ctrl + Shift + H |
| Show Toolbar | Ctrl + Shift + T |
| Show Stats | Ctrl + L |
| Gameview | G |
| Immersive Mode | F11 |
| Set Bookmark | Ctrl + 0 (Add any number up to 9 to set a bookmark in the viewport window) |

## Asset Menu Shortcut

This shortcut opens the Content Browser.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Find in Content Browser | Ctrl + B |

## Asset Shortcuts

Rotate and flip your assets in the viewport window. Select a prop (indicated by a gold outline around the prop) to use the shortcut.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Flip Prop Horizontally | 6 |
| Rotate Prop 90 Degrees | 7 |

## Perspective Menu Shortcuts

Change the viewport perspective.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Perspective | Alt + G |
| Top | Alt + J |
| Bottom | Alt + Shift + J |
| Left | Alt + K |
| Right | Alt + Shift + K |
| Front | Alt + H |
| Back | Alt + Shift + H |

## Lit Menu Shortcuts

Control the lighting for your current level with these shortcuts.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Lit | Alt + 4 |
| Unlit | Alt + 3 |
| Wireframe | Alt + 2 |
| Detail Lighting | Alt + 5 |
| Lighting Only | Alt + 6 |

## Mode Menu Shortcuts

Quickly switch the editing tool you're using.

| Menu Item | Shortcut |
| --- | --- |
| Select | Shift + 1 |
| Landscape | Shift + 2 |
| Modeling | Shift + 3 |
| Animation | Shift + 4 |
| Placement | Shift + 5 |
